plot: When three young men enter a local forest to finally deal with its murderous residents, they come up against unimaginable horrors.
title: The Rookery
plot_es: When three young men enter a local forest to finally deal with its murderous residents, they come up against unimaginable horrors.
plot_en: When three young men enter a local forest to finally deal with its murderous residents, they come up against unimaginable horrors.
